casebody.data:
In re: ESTATE OF John F. PANCARI, Sr., Deceased Kathleen D. Gazda,
v.
SCOTT TOWNSHIP POLICE PENSION FUND Petition of: Kathleen D. Gazda No. 6 WAL 2018 Supreme Court of Pennsylvania. June 26, 2018

ORDER

PER CURIAM .

AND NOW, this 26th day of June, 2018, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is DENIED.
